No.-146750)} Sub: Changes in the provisions of Model Concession Agreement (MCA) for Capacity Augmentation on BOT (Toll) reg: MoRTH vide its letter No. 24028/14/2014-H(Vol-II) dated 15.03.2024 has issued amendments in the provisions of the MCA for Capacity Augmentation on BOT(Toll) issued vide MoRTH letter No_ NH-35014/25/2017-H dated 09.12.2020. 2. The approved amendments are annexed with the MoRTH letter dated 15.03.2024. A copy of the same is attached (Annexure -I) herewith for information and implementation: 3. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: Encl:: As stated above o-o4l14 (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ ROsl PIUs/ CMUsl Site Offices to: 1. Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2. Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3. Web Admin for circulation Uyuu9 NHAL Copy
